about_the_game:
Try to save the earth


ClimaSave's Terraforming Environmental Restoration and Revival Androids (TERRAs) went rogue. What once was humanities last hope to life again on planet earth turned out to be the possible end for terrestrial live.

Not all hope is lost


As a Simulation Specialist it is your task to find a way to stop the TERRAs and save the earth from its impending death. Jump into new procedurally generated simulations to find the one way to save the earth.

Control and build your squad of robots


Fight with up to 7 different robots against the TERRAs and try to stop them from destroying the earth even further. Customize your robots with different lasers and metal alloys to improve on their tactical strengths.

Manage your resources


For every simulation you try, there is only a limited amount of resources you can use to repair or extend your squad. During each mission you can recycle destroyed unitsto stockpile more metal and survive the tactical battles until the TERRAs are defeated.

Unlock different simulation loadouts


Every simulation will be different. So can be your squad that you start with. Show ClimaSave that you are capable of saving the earth to unlock new starting configurations. Each has its own strengths and weaknesses providing a different experience with every playthrough.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubunut 14.04 or more recent
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or more recent
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A retro turn-based tactics game where you have to find the one simulation to save the earth from its impending death. Control your army of robots to fight TERRAs on their mission to destroy the last remaining chance of terrestrial life.
